name: Anthony T
description: I am a passionate person who believes that we have a personal responsibility to do our best in all that we do and in doing so we should display respect, care, and concern for others. I believe that we have a responsibility to help others. I also believe that we have a personal responsibility to take care of ourselves. I am a positive person who is honest and trustworthy.. I have a good sense of humor, am easy going, and flexible. I have worked hard all my life, am responsible, and expect the same of others. I enjoy life and having fun. I am not interested in playing games, counting, or competing for control. I am looking for a relationship with a woman who has the same beliefs, values, and interests. Someone that is flexible, loving, and caring. Someone that is secure, confident, and respectful. I am looking for a person who has the capacity to treat others as they want to be treated
